title: CROW｜CryptoSociology的第一站：社会学是什么
body:
**CROW｜CryptoSociology的第一站：社会学是什么
——Peter Berger《与社会学同游——人文主义的视角》**


社会学的产生
社会学是现代西方特有的思想成果，而且它包含了一种独特的现代意识形式。
只有文化的自我概念（尤其是文化里法定的、权威的和被普遍接受的自我概念）经历过剧烈的振荡，敏锐的人才可能超越文化自我概念的断言去思考问题，才可能去拷问权威。
阿尔伯特·萨洛蒙证明，只有在基督教世界的规定性结构瓦解之后，只有在法国大革命摧毁规定性的社会政治制度之后，现代社会学意义上的“社会”概念才能够出现。
我们可以再次将“社会”构想为大厦的隐蔽结构，大厦的外表遮蔽了内部结构。在中世纪的基督教世界里，威严的宗教一政治外表使“社会”隐蔽无形，这一宗教一政治显形的外表构成了欧洲人的日常世界。正如萨洛蒙所云，宗教改革使基督教世界的团结瓦解之后，绝对权力的国家展现出更加世俗化的政治外表，然而和此前的基督教世界一样，这种政治外表起到的是相同的作用。绝对权力的国家瓦解之后，“社会”的底层框架才进入人们的视野。 “社会”是动机和力量的世界，是不能用官方对社会现实的解释来理解的。例如，社会学家想要知道的是“非正式权力结构”（对此研究感兴趣的美国社会学家弗洛伊德·亨特所用的术语）的构成情况，这是由人及其权力组成的结构形态。


社会学的视角
社会学家的问题万变不离其宗：“人们如何互动？”“他们的关系如何？”“这些关系在机构里是如何组织的？”“推动人和机构的集体观念是什么？”
社会学视角并不有助于我们产生登高望远的观点，而是在一定程度上对主日学校和公民教育里对社会现实的解释产生祛魅作用。
社会学的视角使我们用新的目光去审视我们生活于其中的非常熟悉的世界。社会学家活动的领域是他熟悉的领域，在普通人的世界里游走，和大多数人称为真实的世界贴近。召唤他的还有另一种令人激动的发现——不是发现全然陌生的东西，而是发现熟悉的东西发生了意义上的变化。


社会学的人性价值
平民焦点：
社会学方法中兴趣的平民焦点，即仔细研究其他学者可能认为平淡无奇、不值得作为科学研究对象的事情。人的一切所作所为都能够成为社会学研究的重要课题。
善于倾听：
社会学家需要仔细倾听他人的倾诉而不必提出自己的意见。倾听里至少潜藏着一定的人性化意义，因为在我们这个神经紧张、偏爱饶舌的时代里，几乎没有人愿意抽出时间去专心致志地倾听别人的意见。
评价责任：
社会学最后一个独特的人性价值是社会学家承担着对自己的发现作出评价的责任。在他心理上能够承担的范围内，他的评价不能顾及自己的偏见、好恶、希望或畏惧。


社会学的意义
社会学是非常具有现代性的、很合时宜的批判性思想形式。社会学的认识使我们对这样的社会观念机制持怀疑态度：社会把光明分配给一些人，把黑暗分配给另一些人（包括略微修补后把黑暗和“病态”画等号的现代机制）。
社会学知识有利于培育这样的意识：所有人都在为自己的命运抗争；在属于自己的短暂的生命里，人的身份随时受到威胁，显得格外珍贵，人必须要为界定自己的身份而抗争。
社会学最大的贡献在于，它有利于确立人的主体性，有助于人逃离社会的“监狱”、“陷阱”和“木偶操纵线”，鼓励人去追求自由。


社会学意识的四个母题
社会学意识的第一个母题是“揭露真相”。揭露真相是社会学的固有逻辑：社会学揭露真相的母题并不是心理学的母题，而是方法论的母题。社会学的参考框架有一个内置的方法论，社会学研究的现实的层次并非官方所解释的层次，它带有揭露真相的逻辑必然性，社会学有责任揭示人们用来掩盖互动的托词和宣传。这种揭露真相的责任是社会学的特点之一，它尤其精于把握当代社会的脾气。
社会学家常用“意识形态”这个字眼来揭露既得利益群体使自己具有合法性的真相。“某一思想为社会上的某一既得利益服务时，我们就把这种思想称为意识形态”。意识形态经常地，即使不是一贯地、系统地扭曲社会现实，以便插足它能够插足的地方。社会学揭露真相的母题就是穿透言词的烟幕，深人到行为背后去发现人们不会承认的，而且常常使人不愉快的行为动机。
社会学意识的第二个母题是“不恭敬的态度”。
社会学意识里这种不敬的母题未必隐含着革命的态度。社会学的认识本身就敌视革命的意识形态，这并不是因为社会学有一种保守的偏向，而是因为它不仅看穿了对现状的幻灭感，而且看穿了对未来的虚幻的期待（虚幻的期待就是革命者习惯性的精神营养），因此具有一种非革命性的、温和的清醒意识。
不敬的态度可以表现为情绪，也可以表现为意志，但无论其表现形式如何，不敬的态度始终应该是社会学家头脑里的一种可能性。这种态度可能会与他生活的其他方面隔离开来，也可能掩藏在日常的心态之下，甚至在意识形态上遭到否定。
社会学意识的第三个母题是“中性化趋势”，第四个母题是“世界眼光”。
社会学思想的实质接近于尼采所谓的“怀疑的艺术”。完全的思想尊敬必然意味着社会学的死亡。真正的社会学研究在极权主义的国家很快就消失得无影无踪，纳粹德国就是很好的例子。
社会学的认识有一个隐含的意义：对警察和其他公共秩序的守护者的头脑而言，它始终是一个潜在的危险，因为它总是倾向于使绝对正确的断言中性化，而警察等守护者的头脑总是以这样的断言为依托。
社会学代表的意识是价值完全中性化了的世界的意识。现代社会的地理流动和社会流动速度前所未有，因而自己的文化，包括基本的价值观在时间和空间上都只具有相对性。


社会学对自我的微观分析
“过去是可变的、易变的、不断变化的，这是因为我们回忆过去的经历时往往反复进行新的解释。所以我们说，一个人有多少观点，他就有多少不同的人生经历。”
从社会学的角度来看，自我不再是铁板一块，不再是从一个情景过渡到另一个情景的既定实体。更加准确地说，自我是一个过程，不断被创造和再创造的过程，人进人每一个社会情景时自我都要发生变化，自我靠纤细的记忆之绳串联在一起。


人在社会——社会决定论的几个主题
“自我”的社会定位、社会控制机制、社会分层、社会情景和制度
（1）“自我”的社会定位
如果我们接受涂尔干的观点，那么社会就是横亘在我们面前的客观实在。社会就在那里，不能否认，必须面对。社会外在于我们，包围我们，涵盖我们生活的一切方面。我们生活在社会中，定位于社会体系的某些具体部分。我们的定位几乎预先决定和界定了我们所做的一切：从语言到礼仪，从宗教信仰到自杀的可能性。在社会定位上，社会不考虑我们的愿望。我们从精神上对社会规定和禁令的反抗会于事无补，而且常常是徒劳无益的。社会是客观和外在的事实，特别以压制的形式面对我们。社会制度形塑我们的行为，甚至塑造我们的期望。
社会是一个历史实体，在时间上它超越了任何个人的生命历程。社会走在我们身前，存在于我们身后。我们出生之前，社会已然存在，我们去世之后它将继续存在。我们的生命只不过是漫长岁月里社会宏伟征途中短暂的插曲而已。社会是让我们身陷囹圄的历史囚笼。
（2）群体动力学原理
求得共识的压力难以避免，人极其渴望被群体接受，无论周围的群体是什么样的群体。这种欲望可以很有效地被操纵，群体治疗师、蛊惑人心者和其他实施共识工程（consensus engineering）的专门化人才就善于操纵人的欲望。
（3）社会行为与社会现实
韦伯强调社会行为的意图，涂尔干对社会行为的意图则缺乏兴趣。涂尔干强调社会现实的外在性、客观性，强调社会现实状若“事物”的性质 （“本质”quiddity）。韦伯的主张与此对立，强调主观的意义、意图和解释，这些是行为者参与社会情景时带进来的东西。韦伯同时指出，社会中最终发生的事情可能和行为者的意图截然不同。然而他断言，必须要考虑主观这个维度的全貌，才能够获得充分的社会学知识（verstehen，文化知解法）——社会学知识要对社会里存在的意义作出解释。
涂尔干和韦伯看社会的方式并不是逻辑上矛盾的方式。它们只不过是对立的表述而已，因为它们集中关注的是社会现实的不同方面。社会是客观事实，社会压制甚至制造我们一这样说是完全正确的。但我们有意义的行为支撑着社会大厦，有时还协助改变社会大厦——这样说也是正确的。
实际上，这两句话包含了社会存在的悖论：社会界定我们，又反过来被我们界定。我们与社会合作、共谋。然而，一旦我们用合作、共谋的观点看社会，而不是用被社会压制和制造的观点来看社会，社会看起来就很脆弱。我们要生存下去就需要得到社会的承认，以此获得自我形象和身份；社会也需要得到许多像我们一样的普通人的承认，否则它就不能存在。


社会在人——角色理论、知识社会学、参照群体理论
（1）角色理论与游戏社会
角色理论认为，人的身份是被动接受的，不是主动选择的。从社会学的视角看，身份是社会赋予，并由社会支撑和转换的。
米德认为，社会角色是通过游戏学会的。如果整个社会不具备人为的性质，社交的人为性就不可能成立。社交就是“游戏社会” （playing society）的一种特殊情况，游戏者对其虚构性更加自觉。而社交也是更为宏大的社会结构的一部分，你同样能够与之游戏。通过这样的游戏，儿童学会了扮演“认真”的角色。在社交的过程中，我们在有些时刻回到了童年时代戴着面具的游戏生活里，这也许就是社交的乐趣。
齐美尔的社交理论认为，社交是社会互动的游戏形式，游戏可以作为减轻压力的手段。此外，赫伊津哈把游戏作为人和社会的本质特征，对游戏的定位如下：“除非把人当作游戏的物种,除非研究人游戏和游乐的一面,否则我们就不可能把握人类文化”。
（2）知识社会学
在围绕世界观的大辩论中，社会学提出“谁说的？”这样一个恼人的问题。知识社会学回答“谁说的？”这个问题，试图清理从思想到思想者再到他所处的社会环境的发展脉络”。
社会学视角引进了一丝令人清醒的怀疑要素，这种怀疑态度立竿见影，给人提供保护，使人不至于立即改变自己的信仰。社会学意识的参考框架使人能够以这样的态度去感受自己的经历：人的生活阅历是在若干具体的社会环境里流动的，所有的社会环境都附带着具体的意义体系。这样的社会学意识当然不能够解决何为真理的问题，但它使我们不那么容易掉进人生旅途中遭遇的每一个传教团设置的陷阱。
（3）参照群体理论
如果说知识社会学赋予我们构建社会现实的广阔视野，那么参照群体理论就向我们展示许多小作坊，其中那些构建世界的小群体就在锻造他们心中的宇宙模型。
这个过程中隐蔽的社会心理动力学大概和角色理论的社会心理动力学大同小异。这样的社会心理动力大概是一种原始的欲望：被人接受、有一定归属并与人共同生活在一个世界里。


社会学与人的自由
按照盖伦的制度理论的解释，制度疏导人的行为颇似本能疏导动物的行为。而两者之间存在着一个重大的差异：倘若动物能够反思自己的本能，它一定会说，“我别无选择”；同样，在解释自己为何服从制度的要求时，人们也会说，“我别无选择”。唯一的区别是，动物说的是实情，人却是在欺骗自己。
因为实际上人能够对社会说“不”，而倘若他们采取这样的行动，他们可能就会遭遇令人不快的后果。人们甚至想都不去想把“不”付诸行动，因为他们把服从视为理所当然。他们在制度里生存的性质也许是他们唯一敢于想象的身份，其他的选择似乎是发疯。而这并不改变一个事实：“我必须”几乎在每一个社会情景里都是欺骗自己的谎言。
人的“监狱”、“囚笼”、“枷锁”是自己和社会共同打造的。社会“是‘存在于内心’的现象，社会是在我们心灵最深处存在的一部分……只有理解了内化机制以后，我们才能够理解这个令人难以置信的事实：社会不仅控制着我们的行为，而且塑造着我们的身份、思想和情感。社会的结构成为我们意识的结构。我们受制于社会的枷锁，这个枷锁不是我们被征服后套在我们身上的，而是我们和社会合谋打造的。大多数时候，我们是被自己身上的社会性推入陷阱的。我们来到人世之前，禁锢我们的围墙就已经修好了，但却由我们自己来进行重建。我们与社会的合作就是对自己的背叛，我们自己纵身跳进了社会的陷阱。”
我们看见木偶在小小的剧场里手舞足蹈，任随木偶线的操纵而上上下下，严格按照小小的角色规定进行表演。我们学会了理解木偶剧场的逻辑，发现自己在追随木偶的表演。在社会生活里，我们也被吊挂在操纵我们的“木偶线”上，我们借此给自己定位，并承认自己的定位。在一刹那间，我们觉得自己很像是木偶。不过随后，我们就捕捉住了木偶剧场和人生戏剧的深刻区别：我们可以停止木偶的演出动作，抬头仰望并感知操纵我们的那一套“木偶线”。这个停止演出的动作是我们走向自由的第一步。
社会学框架本身不能验证自由。如果我们想要把自己的论述严格限定在社会学的参考框架里，我们根本就无法探讨自由，因为社会学的参考框架是一个科学的框架。效用和美不同，但不矛盾，效用话语和审美话语这两个世界严格地说是不能比较、不可通约的。同理，自由和因果关系（科学框架）并不矛盾，两者仅仅是不同的术语而已。
萨特认为，人不但是自由的，而且“注定是自由的”（condemned to freedom）。有人借口“身不由己”、“不得已而为之”，其实是放弃了自由的选择，是逃避自由（弗洛姆），这就是“自欺”。所谓“自欺”就是把事实上自愿的行为假装成必需的行为。“自欺”就是逃离自由，就是不诚实地逃避“选择的痛苦”（agony of choice）。
反犹主义（或任何其他形式的种族主义或狂热的民族主义）本质上是“自欺”的，因为它把人的全部属性等同于社会属性。于是，人性就成了没有自由的实实在在的东西。人们的爱恨杀戮都局限于一个神话世界里：在这个世界里人人都成了社会标签，比如纳粹冲锋队员就成了自己的徽章所示的符号，犹太人就成了集中营囚服上标记的深受鄙视的符号。
海德格尔有关“人”的观念说明：如果在泛化的“人”中失去自我，那就是不自由。“这个观念与他探讨本真和非本真的观念有关联。所谓本真的存在就是生活在这样一种清醒的意识中：个人的个性是独一无二、不可替代、无与伦比的特性。与此相比，非本真的存在就是在匿名的‘人’中失去自我，就是把自己独一无二的特性拱手出让给社会构建的抽象概念。”
海德格尔“人”的观念和我们的社会观的相关性，与其说表现在其规定性意义上，不如说表现在认知性意义上。在论述人的“自欺”意义时，我们把社会当作给人提供逃避自由的借口的机制；在说到海德格尔“人”的观念时，我们把社会当作防御恐惧的机制。
社会为我们提供了被我们视之为理所当然的结构（ “安然无虞的世界”），社会是产生非本真存在的共谋。在这些结构里，只要我们遵守规则，我们就能够得到保护，就不至于受到生存境遇终极恐惧的威胁。
波将金（Grigori Aleksandrovich Potemkin）据说为了取悦卡捷琳娜二世而在她巡游的沿途搭建外观悦目的假村庄，社会的墙壁正是竖立在深渊边缘的波将金的村庄 （Potemkin's village）。墙壁的功能是保护我们，使我们不受惊吓，为我们组织一个有意义的世界，使我们在这个世界里的生命有意义。
而一切制度结构都必然依赖欺骗，社会上的一切存在物都带有一点自欺的成分。这个闪光的洞见乍一看令人十分压抑，但它实际上使我们管窥到另一个观点：社会的决定力量并不像我们所料的那样强大，我们依然可以寻求一种本真的生存，但本真的生存同样只能在社会里发生，一切意义都是在社会里传递的。一切通向思考存在的路径都有其社会定位——宗教、哲学、美学的路径都有其社会定位。社会既可能是逃避自由的借口，也可能是获得自由的机缘；同理，社会既可以埋葬我们的形而上求索，也可以提供形而上求索的形式。在这里，我们再次遭遇我们社会生存的无处不在的两面神悖论——社会生存既自由又不自由。社会为大多数人提供的是借口和波将金的村庄，作为自由之路的功能只为少数人开放。即使我们认为社会里的本真是可能的，大多数人也并没有利用这个可能性。


社会暴政的逃生隧道：变革、超然和巧妙利用
变革与神授魅力
社会变革和革命可以推翻社会压力。一切变革都是先内后外的，内心的变革走在社会变革之前，内心的变革就是自由：“实际上，我们审视革命时发现，总是在反抗旧秩序的外在行为出现之前，内在的顺从和忠诚就已经瓦解了....早在社会制度被暴力推翻之前，已经由于人民的鄙视而失去了意识形态的支持。不承认社会规范、反对社会规范的定义总是具有潜在的革命威力。”
“神授魅力（Charisma）对预先界定的力量构成最富有激情的挑战。它用新的意义取代旧的意义，以激进的方式重新界定关于人的存在的预设”。而在神授魅力运动中表现出来的超乎寻常的激情很难能超过一代人的岁月。神授魅力必然走进一个韦伯所谓的“常规化”过程。它会以不那么激进的形式重新整合进社会结构里。先知的后继者是教皇，革命者的后继者是行政官员。宗教革命或政治革命的大地震过去之后，人们在自己认为的新秩序里安顿下来生活，而结果必然证明，变革并不像起初看起来的那样彻底。造反的狂热冷却之后，经济利益和政治雄心就取而代之。旧习惯重新抬头，由神授魅力推动的革命产生的新秩序开始复旧，和其用强大暴力推翻的社会及政治制度表现出令人不安的相似性。
超然与自我流放
超然的态度可以减轻社会压力：倘若不能改变或破坏社会，可以在内心深处采取退让的姿态。超然的态度是抵抗社会控制的办法，这样的处事态度始于老子，斯多葛派把它发展成为一个抵抗的学说。超然的处事者退出社会舞台，隐居到自己的宗教、思想和艺术领域里，进入自我流放的境界，形成“亚文化”和“反社会”等圈子。
巧妙利用与游离
逃避社会暴政的第三种方法是“巧妙利用”。所谓巧妙利用，就是用正常运转之外的方式去利用社会制度。运用这种方法时，个人并不尝试去改变社会结构，也不对社会结构采取超然的态度。相反，他用社会结构的合法守护者未曾预料到的方式去有意识地利用这些社会结构，根据他自己的目的在社会丛莽中独辟蹊径。欧文.戈夫曼分析了“囚徒”（inmates）世界（包括精神病院、监狱和其他压迫机构），他提供的例子充分说明“巧妙利用制度”（work thesystem）为何能够成立。
在这里，游离（ecstasy）是一个有用的概念。所谓的“游离”不是神秘而异常的意识高涨，而是其字面的意思——置身局外或步出理所当然的日常社会时的那种感觉，与自己的世界拉开距离。
一旦个人不必用内心的投人去扮演角色时，一旦他刻意和假装扮演角色而不必内心投人时，扮演者就进人了“游离”的境界，就忘记了“理所当然的世界”。别人认为是命运使然，他却认为只是一套需要考虑的因素；别人认为是重要的身份，他却当作方便的伪装。“游离”改变了他的社会意识，以至于既定性（givenness）变成了可能性（possibility）。
“游离”既有社会学的意义，也有形而上的意义。如果我们以“游离”的姿态走出“理所当然的世界”和“安然无虞的世界”，我们就可以获得自由。只有步出被人视之为理所当然的社会常规，我们才能够直面人的境遇而不必诉诸安慰人的神秘化的骗人把戏。
自由以一定程度的意识解放为前提。无论我们有什么样的获得自由的可能性，倘若我们继续假定，“安然无虞的世界”是唯一可能的世界，那么自由就难以实现。社会给我们提供了温暖的、相当舒服的洞穴，我们可以和同伴蜷缩在洞穴里，给自己擂鼓壮胆，用鼓声淹没黑暗中传来的豺狼虎豹的嗥叫声，而“游离”是走出洞穴、独自面对黑夜的行动。


社会学的人文性质
在自由、真理的坚持不懈的学术传统中，社会学的人文冲动在当代情景中找到了自己的生存空间。社会学中的人文主义性质既体现“在我们如何看这个世界的过程中，也体现在这一学科所蕴含的道德诉求之中”。
社会学既是方法论意义上的“科学”，又是人文关怀意义上的人文学科。社会学关心的首先是人的生存境遇，主张社会学向哲学和史学的人性关怀学习。在人的存在里，人的社会存在是关键的一维，因此社会学反复研究的根本问题是，人之为人有何意义，作为具体情景里的人又有何意义。
对相对性和“选择”的体验不仅是一个普遍的历史现象，而且是每个人生活中真实的生存体验问题。社会学针对这种生存体验的社会根源提出的洞见可能会给我们一丝安慰，有助于我们为令人痛苦的问题寻找一个富有哲理的答案或神学意义上的解答。在这个启示稀缺、令人痛苦的世界里，即使对小小的恩赐，我们也要心存感激。
社会学不是道德科学
社会学家有道德关怀，但社会学不是“道德科学”。我们不能够接受或复活法国社会学由孔德提出、涂尔干继承的那种希望。社会科学不能够推导出一种客观的道德（所谓的“道德科学”，sciencedes moeurs），也无法在此基础上确立一种世俗的问答形式来表述客观的道德。
在美国，社会学知识为政治宣传、军事规划服务的情况已经令人脊背发凉。在极权主义的社会里，社会学知识的应用可能会变成一场疆梦。社会学在当代工业管理、公共关系和广告里的应用也不是道德上的美景。许多社会学家并不认为这样的应用产生了道德上的问题，这个事实本身就足以证明，社会学视角本身不会使人具备道德上更高水平的敏锐性。


社会学的马基雅维利主义
马基雅维利主义是一种看问题的方式，本身在伦理上是中性的。而一旦它被毫无顾忌或缺乏同情心的人利用，它就带上了负面的伦理能量。弗里德里克.梅内克（Friedrich Meinecke）在他论政治马基雅维利主义的历史中阐明：从这位伟大的论国家的意大利诊断师的本意来看，国家理性（raison d'etat）本可以和最严肃的伦理关怀结合起来。
社会学的马基雅维利主义也可以进行这样的结合。比如，马克斯·韦伯的生平就给人客观的教益，使我们看到无情的社会学知识可以和为实现道德理想而进行的小心求证结合起来。但这不能够改变马基雅维利思想被用作卑劣工具的可能性。
如果可以把社会学家当作马基雅维利主义者，那么他的才能既可以为邪恶的事情服务，也可以为解放人的事业服务。社会学家是社会感知的“雇佣兵”。有些“雇佣兵”为压迫者卖命，另一些“雇佣兵”为解放者奋斗。
对于被互相冲突的狂热撕裂的人而言，社会学家像马基雅维利主义者那样拉开距离看社会所作出的贡献并不是微不足道的。互相冲突的狂热有一个重要的共同点：它们有关社会性质的意识形态是浑浑噩噩的。以人的需求为动机，而不是以宏大的政治纲领为动机；有选择地、适度地奉献力量，而不是为极权主义的信仰去牺牲；既怀抱同情心又持怀疑态度；不抱偏见去谋求理解……所有这一切都是社会学在研究人的生存境遇时可以做到的。
社会学的知识使人产生相当程度的清醒意识，这使保守运动和革命运动都遭遇风险：不具备现行意识形态必须要有的轻信态度使保守运动遭遇风险；对乌托邦神话持怀疑态度，而这些神话是培育革命者的必要条件，因此又使革命运动遭遇风险。
清醒意识会让人不由自主地对社会作出激进的诊断，却又没有能力践行激进的政治责任，因而以受虐待狂的姿态去崇拜揭黑幕的人，此外无路可走。这种愤世嫉俗的态度本身是幼稚的，其根源常常是缺乏历史视野。人们可以轻信并顺从现存社会制度永恒的观念，可以轻信并期待即将来临的社会制度，愤世嫉俗的态度并非唯一的选择。
人生如戏、如剧场、如舞台、如狂欢节，社会生存如两面神、如悲喜剧。在人生的社会游戏场里，我们可以将悲悯的情怀、适度的承诺和一定程度的喜剧意识结合起来，产生一种与社会相对的姿态，其基础是认为社会根本是一场喜剧。
在这场喜剧里，人们纷纷登台亮相，身穿花哨的戏剧服装，变换头顶的帽子，改变自己的名号，用手里的棍子互相敲打，或者让同台亮相的演员相信，自己手里握有棍子。这种滑稽的视角并不忽视这样一个事实：实际上不存在的棍子也可以使人真的流血，但这样的事实不会使人把波将金的假村落当作上帝之城。除非游戏规则保护活生生的人，除非游戏规则培育真正的人的价值，否则就会拒绝认真对待游戏规则。由此可见，社会学里的马基雅维利主义和愤世嫉俗的机会主义是决然对立的，前者能够使自由在社会行动中得以实现。

title: [intro] a World Without My Father
body:
As a kid, I grew up in a household where a lot of topics were restricted but ‘death’ often came up casually on many occasions. I was not entirely sure whether it’s a cultural thing or was it because my parents were just being dramatic. If any of my parents were planning to travel just a bit further than the city border, the ‘what you need to do if I got in an accident and didn’t survive’ scenario will surely come up. My mother has this letter of instructions (and yes, it includes the order for me and my siblings to respect, love, take care of, and avoid fighting over wealth distribution with each other). She put it in the first drawer of her nightstand. Although she clearly said not to open it should nothing happen, the curiosity (and self-control) of the 9-year-old me was all over the place. So I opened the envelope, read the letter, and cried. My oldest sister caught me reading the letter, smacked my head with some newspaper, and took it from my hand. After she read it, she cried even more than I did. We bonded for at least a few minutes before she’s mad at me about something else. 

It was heart-wrenching to read the things my mother thought needed to be said in the case of her unexpected death. In the letter, she spoke to us directly, called our name and our shit with so much love, I can’t begin to imagine if anything really happened to her. I thought about it, you know. Would I be able to live a life without her? How would I cope? My father, on the other hand, was very light on the topic. His attitude was more like, “Everyone will face death eventually. If I am dead, good luck to you all, I am out. Bye!” My brother said something about him last week, which I thought was pretty accurate. “\[My father\] He lived his life the way he wanted it,” and that he surely did. He was also pretty confident that he wouldn’t get to age 70. 

My father died just a few months after he turned 69 years old. Last July, when I saw him on my phone screen, lying on the floor with eyes closed and pale lips, my heart pounded hard. I couldn’t even cry but oh how I wished to be there. We all lived in different cities, my siblings and my parents, and that video call was the last time I ever saw him. It was busy, people were panicking on the other side of the phone, unsure what to do with no family members present. But one look at him, and in my gut, I just knew. He was gone. I hung up and called my brother right away. I told him, I *think* he passed away. I called my mother and told her the same news. I had to repeat the sentence five times before she realized what I was saying. I think repeating the news gave me the realization as well. Suddenly, there were no bones in my body and breathing felt impossible. I always thought there would be more tears but all I could feel was this empty space inside of me**.** Was it my heart that was broken? Or my body? Or was it everything? Because it definitely felt like everything in me shattered. How could something be so painful yet so numb? Will this feeling ever go away?

I do have a theory now that the feeling won’t go anywhere. Just like how your heart and your soul suddenly filled with so much love after the birth of your child. This is just the opposite. It probably will be less daunting over time, but I don’t think it will go away. This is how it feels to lose the love of your life, I told myself. A good friend of mine who had a similar relationship with her late father as I had, told me, his presence was in the absence and now that he’s gone, he’s everywhere. That was probably the most relatable thing someone has ever said to me after my father passed. He’s everywhere and I am trying to accept that. 

Rewind to early 2020, when the world declared COVID19 as a pandemic and things went above and beyond crazy, I was so scared my father wouldn’t make it. Look, not to play favorites, but my mother casually gave me a hand sanitizer to keep in my bag (way) before we even heard about Covid19. She’ll thrive in the condition where you have to keep things (and your hands!) clean and spotless, wiping all surfaces every few hours. My father, however, was the total opposite of her. Let’s just say, he’s not germaphobic. Anyhow, my father has had asthma since he was a child, it never got out of hand but this condition made him unqualified for the vaccines. At least, not until his doctor cleared him up for it. He said in full confidence, I would be fine without it. I would not catch the virus. We did the treatments for his condition but never got to the point where he was qualified for the vaccines. 

One of my uncles arrived at my father’s estate, a few seconds after I ended the video call. He took my father to the hospital to check or at least see if there’s anything to do to save him. The doctor called it Death On Arrival, suspecting a heart attack.  To give us peace of mind, we wanted to have the assurance that my father didn’t in fact catch the virus. Past midnight, we got the confirmation from PCR and SWAB tests that came back negative. The drama of getting the test result back just in time for us to prepare for the funeral, I can’t help but grin a little bit, oh my, my father and his life. I could almost hear him chuckling, “I told you so.” 

It's been a little bit over 100 days since his passing and I am still learning how to live in the world without my father. I had this idea to interview my father and make a journal out of it because he has all of these unbelievable stories. I lost a lot of motivation and will recently. With one baby on her way to toddlerhood, who has the time to appropriately grieve? That is why when I read about Mirror in my recent jump into learning about the blockchain, a tiny little spark went off. 

> Would it be crazy to reach out to my father’s friends and talk about whatever connection they have together? I know it would be interesting yet also scary, considering the possibility of finding truths about my father that I (might) don’t want to hear. 

Writing this piece, I could hear my father giving his uninvited opinion in my head, “You better hurry up because my friends are old and they are gonna join me sooner rather than later.” 

So here I am, trying to immortalize my father’s existence through written words. These last two years, people have been experiencing tremendous grief, mourning over their loved ones. We’re going to get through this. I know we don’t know each other but we’ll learn over time how to live in this unknown world. In the meantime, stay healthy and stay strong. I’ll talk to you again soon, along with an interesting story I hope.

title: Crowdfund: The Fabric of Life
body:
## Intro

The “Fabric of Life” NFT collection is a gift from mother earth to your inner child forever. Each piece is a reflection of her children's true essence and represents an emotion we have shared with our parents and grandparents. Together in unity here and now, we celebrate the “Fabric of Life” and your existence in the first dimension, by looking into the mirror of the second dimension we are reminded how to be evolution, patient, and kind. In the third dimension, we are introduced to the concept of time by remembering the past, present, and future and with our emotions and in this fourth dimension, the “Fabric of Life” DAO has the purpose of creating digital art in the metaverse and a mission of creating a different kind of buzz...

We intend on co-creating a message of love, balanced emotions, and a “Fabric of Life” fairy tale with NFT’s for ”Little People” everywhere to enjoy for the rest of time. After the collection of 111 “Fabric of Life” NFT’s have been released we also intend on using the collection for a book and card game launch.

## The Artist

The RonX111 collection is slowly being released on two platforms Rarible and OpenSea. RonX111 is an authentic street artist with all prints and holding the stencils, as well as the actual original artworks. RonX111 was born in Australia and is a street activist, he has a primary focus on bringing balance to all and ensuring the things he loves from family to nature are preserved. He has the ability to make immediate and concrete moves if he believes his higher level is at risk.

RonX111 uses nature and the leading street artists in the world to deliver very timely and deep messages for all, even if it takes time to understand the message being delivered. He sees nature in ways many do not like it’s the thing that brings light to his dark nights and the Sun is what reactivates Ron back into the reality that we all live in. His messages can be very kind and very hard it depends on the temperature of the moment. RonX111 is focused on mother nature, protecting and fighting for the greater universe that will be left in place, not fighting for today he fights for years ahead and every action has a consequence.

[Mirror](https://ronx111.com)

## The Animator

Destrola who is in partnership with RonX111 is the animation artist. Together they take the original art to animation for the NFT market, while they still focus on their unique crafts globally. Consider the life of a Destrola as a curious child, one in which every day was another opportunity to understand and evolve the world around them. Now imagine that child always blending into the background; never defining who they are and usually playing second fiddle to friends and family.

At a certain point, there is a switch and drive to move out of the shadows. In this successful venture, they redefine themselves and realize that they have a knack for understanding perceptions and can use their skills to influence that. Moving forward Destrola forges a career in animation and design; spending time with clients to understand the questions that need to be asked and creating solutions that answer them. At the age of 23 Destrola starts pivoting into the realm of education and became a lecturer and tutor at a university; reevaluating the base understandings and helping students begin to question their own perspective of the world through their designs and creations.

[Mirror](https://www.destrola.com)

## RISE: Humboldt Grace Fire Recovery Project

Remembering the Wildfires that devastated their homeland of Australia in 2020, sitting idly by was not an option. [Cannabis Art Guild](http://Cannabisartguild.org) will be Auctioning off “RISE” between October 1st - November 30th, 2021 with 100% of proceeds going to the [Humboldt Grace Fire Recovery Project.](https://humboldtgrace.org/fire-recovery/) When legendary street artist RonX111 and world-class animator Destrola became aware of the Humboldt Grace Fire Recovery Project they sprung into action creating these special 1 of 1 Charitable NFT collections.

# Love Is All You Need

All you need is Love and Love is your need - Art was to be spray painted in London, of a boy who lost his Father. This is the initial piece of a larger upcoming Collection.

title: Balance memo
body:
Hi team,

See below a summary of why I’m excited about Balance. The goal is twofold: 1) for me to really structure my thoughts and why I have conviction 2) for internal communication and alignment so everyone can build their own view/challenge mine.** 
 **

Simply put, Richard wants to build the consumer interface to interact and benefit from the wave of decentralised protocols and their associated tokens. He’s particularly interested in the economic protocols that are lowering the barriers of access to financial services creating what he calls “open-source banking”. He thinks that the biggest benefit of Bitcoin and its wide adoption as the equivalent of digital gold has created a system allowing anyone to participate into financial services. Open-source banking is not the future, it’s already happening. He makes an interesting comparison with the neobanks. They all had to raise a lot of money to issue cards and progressively move people to their current account. In the meantime, multiple ethereum wallets have attracted billions under management almost “overnight”… Obviously this analogy has its limits as in today’s world you can do more things with the fiat money on a neobank card than with any tokens but still it’s an interesting perspective on this new world.

His long term vision is to build a Distributed Autonomous Bank. He explains it [here](https://medium.com/balance-io/distributed-autonomous-banks-dabs-90701f5758d5). I recommend you to read the post as he touches on KYC, custody, recoverability, (@Remus I know you were interested in these topics). As you will see, several of the building blocks to achieve that vision are work-in-progress and Balance is not trying to do it all so a potential investment is also a wider bet on this market continuing to develop. 

So what are they building?** 
 **

[Balance manager](https://manager.balance.io/): The first product they released is Manager, a desktop tool allowing you to send, receive and exchange tokens by connecting you to different wallets (where you actually store your tokens). Manager currently supports Metamask (the largest browser wallet), Ledger and Trezor, the two most popular hardware wallet (cold storage). It now also supports WalletConnect which has also been built by the Balance team. I highly recommend you try it, while still early and basic, I find it a really great UX and the best way to start buying all sorts of ERC-20 tokens. If you have dealt with Metamask before, you will see a huge difference.

[WalletConnect](https://walletconnect.org/): It’s been incubated by Richard and his team and they have now created a separate non-profit entity that should benefit the whole industry. It’s an open-source standard for connecting desktop Dapps to mobile Wallets using end-to-end encryption by scanning a QR code. It’s a great way for users to use/interact with Dapp without compromising their private key as they can just sign/approve any transaction on their mobile wallet. So far, people have mostly used their tokens for speculation but as people start to stake, vote, pay, etc they will be using their tokens and “signing” transactions all the time. You need an easy and secure way for people to approve/sign without compromising private keys. The goal is for as many dapps as possible to support it and make it the Bluetooth for decentralised applications. [Pedro Gomes](https://twitter.com/pedrouid?ref_src=twsrc%5Egoogle%7Ctwcamp%5Eserp%7Ctwgr%5Eauthor) who was a Balance engineer is now doing this full-time and Richard sits on the board but it’s clearly separate from Balance (so not something we would be investing in). I think it’s interesting because it says a lot about the team: their focus on creating great UI/UX without compromising security, their interest in contributing to the whole industry, the fact that they are not exclusively driven by money and their ability to execute (they have shipped this in a few weeks. ** 
 **

*“Your phone has your wallet that securely stores your private keys. When you want to interact with a dapp on the web you scan a QR code to link your wallet to the dapp. When you want to make a transaction it pushes a notification to your phone where you can confirm or reject the transaction.”*** 
 **

In 2018, they want to have 5 wallets and 50 dapps supporting it, they have already signed up ImToken, 0x and Dharma protocols as partners. They have also secured a $150k grant from the Ethereum foundation. 

See a demo by a team working on an identity protocol and using wallet connect:** 
 **

*[How you could login and pay for Netflix in web 3.0 era](https://twitter.com/pet3rpan_/status/1030011892981481472)* 

You can read more about it here: <https://medium.com/balance-io/walletbridge-a-simple-way-for-web-based-dapps-to-talk-to-mobile-wallets-5c4015f1838c>

<https://medium.com/balance-io/0x-dharma-imtoken-join-walletconnect-87a3dd4dea8d>

[Balance Wallet](https://balance.io/): A [non-custodian](https://medium.com/guarda/%EF%B8%8Fcustodial-vs-non-custodial-wallet-s-%EF%B8%8F-benefits-of-light-wallets-87cf701054d1) mobile wallet for iOS and Android. This is where you store your funds, tokens and collectibles and interact with them. First of all, I think it’s worth mentioning that the word “wallet” is probably a bit misleading or at least restrictive. The “browser” analogy gives a more comprehensive view of the role of such a product. This is where you will interact with these tokens and dapps, approving signature, staking, etc. If Richard’s vision materialise you could apply for a loan, participates into a prediction market like Augur, etc** 
 **

> Chemistry questions:** 
 **

1. *Vision: \*What do they believe that is not visible (yet) to others?*

*That assets like Bitcoin and ETH and other new emerging economic protocols are creating a new open source and fairer banking system. This industry requires UI and UX innovation to attract million of users creating an opportunity to build a new kind of organisation that will become the gateway for people to participate into this alternative financial services industry.* 

2. *Market: What happens if they are right and can deliver? How big can this be?*

*We’re talking about creating a “bank” for this new & alternative financial services industry that is global and borderless.* 

3. *Product: With a team of 3-4, they have built and released 2 Balance products: desktop manager and a mobile non-custodian wallet (in beta, not on the appstore yet) as well as an open-source standard for dapps to communicate with mobile wallets that is quickly being adopted by the wider industry, WalletConnect.*
4. 
5. *Team: What is special about [the team](https://balance.io/about/)? Why them?*
   1. *[Christian Baroni](https://baroni.co/), design ex-Stripe*
   2. *[Jin Chung](https://www.linkedin.com/in/jinchung17), lead engineer, ex-machine learning infrastructure at eBay*
   3. *Richard Burton, ex Stripe, Ethereum*

      ** 
 **
6. *Timing: why now?* 

*The crazy 2017 bull market around cryptoassets has attracted massive inflow of capital and talent into the industry. There are now a very large number of teams working on building new protocols. Most of these protocols have economic incentives tied to it. Bitcoin and Ethereum have made money programmable. It’s becoming clear that new interfaces and UX standards will be required to embark the next wave of millions of users on these protocols and benefit from them. From another angle, as our life becomes increasingly digital and people are pushing more decentralisation, a digital wallet for decentralised protocols will become a key product for web 3.0*

> Why I’m excited

I think Balance has the potential to become an iconic product in web 3.0 and technological breakthrough that crypto represents. I agree with Richard that in the near future, the use cases enabled by crypto are likely to be closely related to money and some kind of financial services. Bitcoin and Ethereum have made money and value programmable. Economic incentives are inherent to most of the protocols being built. We’re seeing a new sort of financial services industry being built. I don’t expect this category to entirely replace the existing banking sector (at least not in the next 10-20 years?) but it will provide new assets, applications and services (e.g. Bitcoin as a reserve value, prediction markets, tokenized assets, Cryptokitties and others as forms of digitally scarce collectibles, etc). As it was the case with the Internet and the Web when browsers that were the first to add graphics and hyperlinks helped embark the next generation of users, new interfaces are needed to transition from niches uses of decentralised protocols to mass-market appeal.  The bet here is that the equivalent of the browser will be the “wallet”. Digital wallets are increasingly becoming a key part of our digital and physical life. They already are in China where Wechat can be considered the equivalent of a digital wallet and that is clearly where Coinbase is moving to as well with the [rebrand of Toshi into Coinbase Wallet](https://blog.coinbase.com/goodbye-toshi-hello-coinbase-wallet-the-easiest-and-most-secure-crypto-wallet-and-browser-4ba6e52e4913) incl chat functionality (and why David Marcus left the board as Facebook is working on their own initiative). Balance is focused on building the most elegant and useful mobile wallet for interacting with economics protocols. Whether the open source banking vision materialises or not, I think backing a great product team building a digital wallet in a very unique way makes a lot sense.** 
 **

The team...My conviction is largely based on Richard as a very unique individual. I’m intrigued and fascinated by his journey/quest and have been very impressed by his trajectory in the last 12 months. I have seen how his vision, energy and determination have all come together to make some decisions (stop remote working with decentralised team) and start to ship some really interesting products while becoming extremely visible in the space and publishing some great content. His productivity in the last 2-3 months has been insane.  I have never seen a more missionary founder than him. As a result, he can be very intense and I suspect it’s not always easy to work with him but I have no doubt about his integrity. He’s honest, generous and not doing this for the money. 

Risks: ** 
 **

* Market: there is a big macro risk in this industry due to volatility, regulation, etc.
* Competition: There are a lot of crypto wallets out there. The main competitor is Coinbase. They are already the leaders in converting people from fiat to crypto via their main product. With the Toshi app that has just been rebranded to Coinbase wallet this week, they are moving into Balance territory. Coinbase has demonstrated an amazing ability to execute (e.g. one of the few exchanges that hasn’t been hacked) and buying a lot of teams/talent. However, there are some reasons why I think Balance is unique and could thrive. Coinbase wallet is one project among many others at Coinbase (between their retail product, institutional platforms, etc), they are already a large company doing lots of things and “stuck” into a very profitable business model. Then, and more importantly, Coinbase is effectively rebuilding a centralised bank. Anyone who has tried to withdraw money from their accounts can testify that it’s not straightforward, you’re not really in control. While their mission to build a more open financial system is very similar to Balance, there is a fundamental philosophical difference that will impact their product, their talent, their culture. Balance wants to build an open-source and decentralised bank. Their code is already completely open source. In a way Coinbase is still very much a web 2.0 company building on web 3.0 tech (which is why they are pushing their wallet as their web 3.0 product), Balance wants to be the native wallet for web 3.0. The opportunity to back a talented team and company wanting to challenge Coinbase with a fundamentally different and ambitious approach and philosophy is I think extremely exciting (but obviously hard)
* Technological risks: The success of Balance will depend on the success of projects and the continued development of the decentralised architecture. These economic protocols will have to work and deliver real value beyond speculation and a lot of the building blocks for an open and decentralised financial system like identity, recoverability, etc are still being built. 
* Richard: I think he’s a total outlier and he’s a big reason for my excitement but I also think his personality could be a challenge. I trust his values and intentions but he is very intense, opinionated,  etc and is very open about his personal challenges.

Fund returner: there is no clear business model yet. Because of the competition and Richard’s philosophy we shouldn’t expect them to simply charge fees on each transaction like Coinbase. However, if they become the gateway into economic protocols and attract millions of users, I have no doubt they will capture some important value. Great UI and consumer products will be rewarded. He wrote a great blog post about the business model and his emerging ideas, presenting hash fees as the new cash flow source. They want to support the protocols that have the potential to generate positive hashflow and by bringing people through these protocols help increase the amount of hashes flowing through and eventually capturing some of it. More details [here](https://medium.com/balance-io/hashflow-cashflow-7058fb60ddc5).

大多数人第一次听到“metaverse”这个词时，会是在 Facebook 品牌重塑的背景下 , 他们会认为他们发明了它，因为他们以前从未考虑过类似的事情 , 如果他们最终控制它，这取决于我们,
我已经看够了 Zuck 的主题演讲，在那里他反复谈到数字物品的“真正所有权”，我会做出这样的猜测： Facebook 将重新尝试推出自己的区块链，但这一次它不会专注于金钱, 相反，它将专注于 NFT,如果他们选择以太坊 L2，我会感到惊喜，但我对此表示怀疑 , 我的猜测是，他们将支持对基于以太坊的资产进行某种程度的互操作，但他们会尝试将所有新创建的资产汇集到他们自己的、由受信任方控制的联合链中,为什么这很重要？ 因为无论成为事实上的元界资产轨道也成为元界经济层（将价值数万亿） , 我怀疑 Zuck 会想放弃控制它的机会（相对于他无法控制的以太坊）,
假设： 新进入者的许多近期 DeFi 使用可能感觉更短暂：将资产代币化到链上，在链上使用它们，完成后以美元结算 , 但 NFT 是独特且持久的，而可替代资产则不然 , 即，他们所处的链条更重要,
我不在乎它是否受欢迎，但如果你关心抗审查的数字财产，那么你应该关心以太坊 , 没有其他任何东西可以证明它具有抗审查性 , 也许这会改变，或者以太坊将被证明是最好的和缺陷最少的模型,所以不，我不会告诉你你在哪条链上购买你的 NFT 并不重要，而且它们都将在 50 年内存在 , 我怀疑他们中的许多人不会，或者某些公链的控制权会随着时间的推移而转移，您可能无法访问您的财产，向我展示另一条链，它重视真正去中心化的精神，而不是每秒标题 L1 交易数 ， 答案：他们都没有 ， 他们都在向你推销一个梦想——一个大多数人无法长期实现的梦想，其后果目前可能不大。您只是无法访问您认为自己拥有的一些 jpeg ， 但是，如果 Metaverse 变得很大，正如我所怀疑的那样，那么您的“永远的数字财产”的安全性以及如何获得安全将非常重要 ， 我选择以太坊，
如果以太坊 L1+L2 资产是世界可能很快就会寻找的“开放”元节标准的核心，那会怎样？ 去中心化的、抗审查的资产至少是成功的一半 ， 不可审查的服务访问是另一个，坦率地说，我对任何保证不可审查的服务访问的公司持怀疑态度（在 web2 中根本不存在） ， 他们创建的任何 DAO 都可能充满亲信 ， 也许最好的结果是许多提供者，其中一些由更有机的、非公司的 DAO 管理，
进一步阐述，我怀疑 Facebook 的“去中心化元节”的想法将成为他们可以严重影响制定“去中心化标准”的裙带公司（a la Libre） ， 我认为原生 web3-industry 需要团结起来推动一个更开放的 IETF-like 模型，
现在看扎克的公告 ， 下面带时间戳的链接 ， 他谈到了 Metaverse 需要如何建立在开放的、可互操作的标准上——项目和内容不会被锁定在一个平台上（尽管他们正在构建一个 API） ， 甚至提到加密和 NFT，ofc，我对 Zuck 不太有信心，因为毕竟我们在谈论 Facebook（随着时间的推移，控制可能会在更深层次上蔓延）， 但也许有一些人认识到，为了成功，无情的控制和所有权是没有好处的 ， 待定，他甚至提到了“新的治理形式”，这可能是对 DAO 等更加去中心化的治理模型的一种认可 ， ofc，如果他甚至在谈论“天秤座式”的去中心化，那将有很多不足之处，顺便说一句，我确实认为在 Facebook 围墙花园之外创建具有文化价值的项目（即 NFT）很重要，现在/今天 ， 向他们和其他公司推荐更开放的模型可能就足够了，因为没有这些项目，它们就不那么相关了，危险在于，一旦你步入正轨，用户是否会“放弃”他们对去中心化的偏好 ， 简单的答案是说“是的，他们会”，但也许答案更复杂 ， 大多数人对 web2 的工作方式并不满意，即使他们容忍它， 3D 元节是一种更亲密的东西，你和其他人在一个空间中“物理地”——这与在某人的“墙上”写字不同 ， 所以如果 Facebook 没有得到它，也许其他人会 ， 也许我们甚至会看到像 IETF 这样的组织出现用于元节标准管理，无论哪种方式，就目前而言，“文化”在去中心化的数字土地上继续成长和发展至关重要。 这就是为什么我现在并将继续成为以太坊 L1 和 L2 上 NFT 的大力支持者，最后，我绝对不看好 Facebook 的意图 ， 不管他们说什么，我们从历史上就知道他们的作案手法 ， 如果我们将控制权交给像他们这样的公司，这取决于我们 ， 我的建议：不要给一英寸，

title: Crowdfund: The Fabric of Life
body:
## Intro

The “Fabric of Life” NFT collection is a gift from mother earth to your inner child forever. Each piece is a reflection of her children's true essence and represents an emotion we have shared with our parents and grandparents. Together in unity here and now, we celebrate the “Fabric of Life” and your existence in the first dimension, by looking into the mirror of the second dimension we are reminded how to be evolution, patient, and kind. In the third dimension, we are introduced to the concept of time by remembering the past, present, and future and with our emotions and in this fourth dimension, the “Fabric of Life” DAO has the purpose of creating digital art in the metaverse and a mission of creating a different kind of buzz...

We intend on co-creating a message of love, balanced emotions, and a “Fabric of Life” fairy tale with NFT’s for ”Little People” everywhere to enjoy for the rest of time. After the collection of 111 “Fabric of Life” NFT’s have been released we also intend on using the collection for a book and card game launch.

## The Artist

The RonX111 collection is slowly being released on two platforms Rarible and OpenSea. RonX111 is an authentic street artist with all prints and holding the stencils, as well as the actual original artworks. RonX111 was born in Australia and is a street activist, he has a primary focus on bringing balance to all and ensuring the things he loves from family to nature are preserved. He has the ability to make immediate and concrete moves if he believes his higher level is at risk.

RonX111 uses nature and the leading street artists in the world to deliver very timely and deep messages for all, even if it takes time to understand the message being delivered. He sees nature in ways many do not like it’s the thing that brings light to his dark nights and the Sun is what reactivates Ron back into the reality that we all live in. His messages can be very kind and very hard it depends on the temperature of the moment. RonX111 is focused on mother nature, protecting and fighting for the greater universe that will be left in place, not fighting for today he fights for years ahead and every action has a consequence.

[Mirror](https://ronx111.com)

## The Animator

Destrola who is in partnership with RonX111 is the animation artist. Together they take the original art to animation for the NFT market, while they still focus on their unique crafts globally. Consider the life of a Destrola as a curious child, one in which every day was another opportunity to understand and evolve the world around them. Now imagine that child always blending into the background; never defining who they are and usually playing second fiddle to friends and family.

At a certain point, there is a switch and drive to move out of the shadows. In this successful venture, they redefine themselves and realize that they have a knack for understanding perceptions and can use their skills to influence that. Moving forward Destrola forges a career in animation and design; spending time with clients to understand the questions that need to be asked and creating solutions that answer them. At the age of 23 Destrola starts pivoting into the realm of education and became a lecturer and tutor at a university; reevaluating the base understandings and helping students begin to question their own perspective of the world through their designs and creations.

[Mirror](https://www.destrola.com)

## RISE: Humboldt Grace Fire Recovery Project

Remembering the Wildfires that devastated their homeland of Australia in 2020, sitting idly by was not an option. [Cannabis Art Guild](http://Cannabisartguild.org) will be Auctioning off “RISE” between October 1st - November 30th, 2021 with 100% of proceeds going to the [Humboldt Grace Fire Recovery Project.](https://humboldtgrace.org/fire-recovery/) When legendary street artist RonX111 and world-class animator Destrola became aware of the Humboldt Grace Fire Recovery Project they sprung into action creating these special 1 of 1 Charitable NFT collections.

title: Inflatie
body:
De inflatie in de eurozone is deze maand toegenomen tot 4,1 procent op jaarbasis, meldt het Europees statistiekbureau Eurostat op basis van voorlopige cijfers. Sinds juli 2008 was de geldontwaarding niet meer zo hoog. De sterk gestegen energieprijzen zijn de belangrijkste oorzaak van de hogere inflatie. Ten opzichte van vorig jaar oktober werd energie 23,5 procent duurder.

De inflatie loopt daarmee verderop, aangezien het percentage in september nog 3,4 procent was. Volgens Eurostat komt de inflatie in Nederland in oktober uit op 3,8 procent, een toename van 0,8 procent. Daarmee presteert ons land beter dan buurlanden België en Duitsland, waar de inflatie naar verwachting uit komt op respectievelijk 5,4 en 4,6 procent.

In andere grote economieën, waaronder Italië en Frankrijk, valt geldontwaarding lager uit. De Baltische staten en Spanje krijgen in oktober te maken met de hoogste inflatie, terwijl in Portugal en Mala de inflatie onder de 2 procent blijft.

title: Crowdfund: The Fabric of Life
body:
## Intro

The “Fabric of Life” NFT collection is a gift from mother earth to your inner child forever. Each piece is a reflection of her children's true essence and represents an emotion we have shared with our parents and grandparents. Together in unity here and now, we celebrate the “Fabric of Life” and your existence in the first dimension, by looking into the mirror of the second dimension we are reminded how to be evolution, patient, and kind. In the third dimension, we are introduced to the concept of time by remembering the past, present, and future and with our emotions and in this fourth dimension, the “Fabric of Life” DAO has the purpose of creating digital art in the metaverse and a mission of creating a different kind of buzz...

We intend on co-creating a message of love, balanced emotions, and a “Fabric of Life” fairy tale with NFT’s for ”Little People” everywhere to enjoy for the rest of time. After the collection of 111 “Fabric of Life” NFT’s have been released we also intend on using the collection for a book and card game launch.

## The Artist

The RonX111 collection is slowly being released on two platforms Rarible and OpenSea. RonX111 is an authentic street artist with all prints and holding the stencils, as well as the actual original artworks. RonX111 was born in Australia and is a street activist, he has a primary focus on bringing balance to all and ensuring the things he loves from family to nature are preserved. He has the ability to make immediate and concrete moves if he believes his higher level is at risk.

RonX111 uses nature and the leading street artists in the world to deliver very timely and deep messages for all, even if it takes time to understand the message being delivered. He sees nature in ways many do not like it’s the thing that brings light to his dark nights and the Sun is what reactivates Ron back into the reality that we all live in. His messages can be very kind and very hard it depends on the temperature of the moment. RonX111 is focused on mother nature, protecting and fighting for the greater universe that will be left in place, not fighting for today he fights for years ahead and every action has a consequence.

[Mirror](https://ronx111.com)

## The Animator

Destrola who is in partnership with RonX111 is the animation artist. Together they take the original art to animation for the NFT market, while they still focus on their unique crafts globally. Consider the life of a Destrola as a curious child, one in which every day was another opportunity to understand and evolve the world around them. Now imagine that child always blending into the background; never defining who they are and usually playing second fiddle to friends and family.

At a certain point, there is a switch and drive to move out of the shadows. In this successful venture, they redefine themselves and realize that they have a knack for understanding perceptions and can use their skills to influence that. Moving forward Destrola forges a career in animation and design; spending time with clients to understand the questions that need to be asked and creating solutions that answer them. At the age of 23 Destrola starts pivoting into the realm of education and became a lecturer and tutor at a university; reevaluating the base understandings and helping students begin to question their own perspective of the world through their designs and creations.

[Mirror](https://www.destrola.com)

## RISE: Humboldt Grace Fire Recovery Project

Remembering the Wildfires that devastated their homeland of Australia in 2020, sitting idly by was not an option. [Cannabis Art Guild](http://Cannabisartguild.org) will be Auctioning off “RISE” between October 1st - November 30th, 2021 with 100% of proceeds going to the [Humboldt Grace Fire Recovery Project.](https://humboldtgrace.org/fire-recovery/) When legendary street artist RonX111 and world-class animator Destrola became aware of the Humboldt Grace Fire Recovery Project they sprung into action creating these special 1 of 1 Charitable NFT collections.

title: MIM 正在挑战 MakerDAO？读懂 MIM 发明者的三个 DeFi 项目
body:
> Abracadabra 创始人 Daniele Sestagalli 还通过 LP 收益优化器 Popsicle Finance、Avalanche 上的 OlympusDAO 分叉项目 Wonderland，引发了「占领 DeFi」热潮。

**撰文：Karen**

过去两个月内，基于生息资产的借贷协议 Abracadabra 的治理代币 SPELL 暴涨 60 倍，同期锁仓量激增 7 倍达到了近 30 亿美元，作为 Abracadabra 创始人的 Daniele Sestagalli 在加密社区颇受关注，而其在加密领领域的布局远不止此，LP 收益优化器 Popsicle Finance、Avalanche 上的 OlympusDAO 分叉项目 Wonderland 也是他的「杰作」。

根据公开资料，Daniele Sestagalli 毕业于巴拿马美洲大学建筑系，在构建这三个项目之前，Daniele Sestagalli 曾在 2016 年创立区块链初创公司 Zulu Republi，也是基于区块链的音乐科技平台 Utopia Genesis Foundation 的首席战略官。

### Abracadabra：正在挑战 MakerDAO？

Abracadabra 势头迅猛是 Daniele Sestagalli 知名度得以大幅提升的主要驱动力。Abracadabra 允许用户通过存入生息资产来借入美元稳定币 MIM （神奇的互联网货币），目前支持以太坊、币安智能链、Avalanche、Fantom 和 Arbitrum One，并上线了耕种、借贷、质押、兑换和跨链桥等功能。关于 Abracadabra 具体的功能和双代币模型可参考阅读《[已上线 Arbitrum 的 Abracadabra 如何通过生息资产构建链上稳定币协议？](https://www.chainnews.com/articles/483003047935.htm)》。

Abracadabra 凭借多链部署、支持使用多种生息资产和少数加密货币借入稳定币以帮助提升资金利用率的优势，「正在挑战稳定币协议龙头项目 MakerDAO」的言论也不无道理，诸如，MIM 流通量突破 18 亿美元，目前为 Dai 的 26%，据 CoinGekco 数据，按稳定币流通量来看已超越 Pax Dollar （USDP）、TrueUSD （TUSD）位列第六；锁仓量达到了 MakerDAO 的五分之一；SPELL 持有地址数达到 2.3 万，接近 MKR 的三分之一；近一周在以太坊链上 sSPELL 的费用收入是 MakerDAO 的两倍。

![MIM 正在挑战 MakerDAO？读懂 MIM 发明者的三个 DeFi 项目](https://img.chainnews.com/material/images/e63cfa988ccb51629bb95ac765c3546b_MxjXvXg.png-article)

在近期的进展方面，Abracadabra 还与 Terra 达成了合作，根据 The Defiant，合作可能包括 MIM-UST 流动性池和 LUNA 抵押品，允许用户用他们的 LUNA 代币借入 MIM。Abracadabra 另一核心贡献者 Squirrel 还提出与 Tornado.cash 合作的提案，以将 MIM 也发展成注重隐私的稳定币，不过当前尚不清楚具体的合作细节。

Abracadabra 联合创始人 Squirrel [告诉](https://thedefiant.io/abracadabra-mim-stablecoin-makerdao/) The Defiant，这个项目成功的秘诀是多方面的，几乎仅支持生息资产作为抵押品的可组合性特点即保留了生息资产的利息，还能同时借入资金，另一方面，Abracadabra 的费用结构也非常有吸引力，75% 的协议费用会用来购买 SPELL，然后分发给 sSPELL 持有者，20% 会被分配到金库来激励 MIM 流动性池。

### Popsicle Finance：LP 收益优化器

而在推出 Abracadabra 之前，即，今年一季度末，Daniele Sestagalli 还和 Squirrel 为想要提供流动性的用户推出了一个多链收益率优化平台 Popsicle Finance （ICE），Popsicle 是冰棒的意思。Popsicle Finance 的工作机制是，在接收用户提供的资产后，通过自动比较多个区块链上多个 AMM 机制的 DEX 的资金池，来为用户将资金部署到收益最优的资金池中。

Popsicle Finance 支持的网络有以太坊、币安智能链和 Fantom，还计划支持 Tron、Polygon、Solana 和波卡，产品有针对 Uniswap V3 设计的 Sorbetto Fragola、LP 收益优化优化器 Sorbetto Limone、借贷协议 Gelateria 以及 USDT 包装器 Frapped.io。

其中，Sorbetto Fragola 专为引入范围内挂单（Range Orders）的 Uniswap V3 设计，会根据历史波动率数据积极帮助用户管理流动性和提升在 Uniswap V3 的资本效率，而对于用户来说，通过 Sorbetto Fragola 仅存入单边资产或对应实时比例的双边资产，就可以收到份额代币 PLP （Popsicle Liquidity Provision），然后其他策略参数都交由 Sorbetto Fragola 上的策略上运行。

Sorbetto Limone 就是前面所说的多链流动性收益优化器，会将用户的流动性部署到在多个网络上收益最优的去中心化交易所中。目前 Sorbetto Limone 还在开发中，可能会在近期上线。就流动性提供者而言，不必手动查询和切换流动性即可享受最优收益，还可节省很大一部分 Gas 费，而对于整个生态系统来说，流动性也会变得更有效，交易者也能享受到最好的价格。

与此同时，Daniele Sestaylor 将平台上 LP 代币 PLP 的作用也发挥到最大化。根据 Popsicle Finance [文档](https://docs.popsicle.finance/)，还会推出一个借贷协议 Gelateria，允许用户抵押 LP 代币 PLP 来借入资产。另外，Frapped.io 已在币安智能链和 Fantom Opera 上推出 FUSDt。

而关于治理代币 ICE，今年 7 月份，Popsicle Finance 团队在权衡协议的营销预算、激励方案以及项目的受欢迎程度之后，提出销毁原定总供应量的 64.98%（主要销毁潜在的 LP 奖励）的提案，并在几天之内获得通过并完成销毁。

![image (1).png](https://img.chainnews.com/material/images/9d68a7e2cf5e5791b16670b6bf8f56ec_cflI2R9.png-article)

![image (2).png](https://img.chainnews.com/material/images/0dbf2d341f9c5af6a23df223d140d33a_9KxlHnd.png-article)

那么，治理代币 ICE 是如何在 Popsicle Finance 平台上发挥作用的呢？除治理作用外，该平台产品收取的所有绩效费（当前为利润的 10%，当前正在提议增加到 20%）会以 ICE 的形式分发给 nICE 持有者，nICE 是用户抵押 ICE 至 nICE 池后得到的存款凭证。

不幸的是，今年 8 月初，Popsicle Finance 遭到黑客攻击损失了约 2000 万美元，之后将受到影响的 Sorbetto Fragola 产品下架并计划在经过四重审机等流程后重启。同时，Popsicle Finance 发布较为独特的赔偿计划，首先从 IronBank 获得了 100 万美元的贷款，偿还了受损资金的 5%，然后在之后的每个月中会至少获得 50 万美元的贷款来偿还用户资金。 此外，Popsicle Finance 还会制作两款 NFT，一款空投给受影响用户，一款（共 1 万个）会通过拍卖出售，出售资金也会用来偿还被盗资金。另一方面 Daniele Sestagalli 也承诺会在 1 年之内从其个人额度中拿出 100 万枚 ICE 来偿还受影响用户。

可以看到，Popsicle Finance 遭遇黑客攻击后在安全流程、协议启动规划以及赔偿等方面后迅速响应，并提出了令用户比较满意的补偿方案。有趣的是，ICE 的价格项目在被盗当日跌约 40% 之后的两个月内，大涨 16 倍至 24 美元左右，按当前价格来算，Daniele Sestagalli 承诺要补偿的这 100 万枚代币的价值就已超被盗资金。

### Wonderland：Avalanche 上的 OlympusDAO 分叉项目

算法稳定币项目 Wonderland （TIME）也是在 Avalanche 上推出的 OlympusDAO 分叉项目，Wonderland 的中文意思为仙境。该项目最初为匿名项目，之后，Daniele Sestagalli 在推特承认为其开发。

在 Wonderland 中，每个 TIME 代币都由金库中的一篮子资产提供支持，包括 MIM、TIME-AVAX LP 代币等，也仿照 OlympusDAO 引入了质押和铸造将激励设计机制和博弈论结合起来。需要注意的是，1 个 TIME 的价值由 MIM 提供支持（而非挂钩），这意味着，TIME 的交易价格会始终高于 1MIM，而当 TIME 的交易价格低于 1MIM 时，协议就会回购并销毁 TIME，以将 TIME 价格助推至 1MIM 以上。

参考阅读：《[Olympus 是庞氏还是创新？从大师级的激励设计机制谈起](https://www.chainnews.com/articles/951499499761.htm)》

从用户层面来看，有两种参与 Wonderland 的方式，其一是质押 TIME 通过自动复利来赚取更多的 TIME，实质上，是质押 TIME 后可获得 MEMO （质押凭证），然后 MEMO 余额会根据当前的收益率每 8 小时通过复利自动增加；其二是铸币，即提供 LP 代币（包括 TIME-AVAX LP 或 TIME-MIM LP）、MIM 或 wAVAX 来以折扣价铸造（或购买） TIME，不过，需要在铸造 5 日后完全释放。

另一方面，协议为其金库获得了流动性，随着获得的流动性越来越多，也能够进一步赚取到更多的做市商佣金，增加协议收入。这部分收入会由金库来铸造 TIME，然后再将很大一部分分发给 TIME 质押者，从而保证系统的稳定性和 PCV （协议控制价值）。

截止撰稿时，Wonderland 的金库余额为 1.34 亿美元，TIME 总质押率为 8.7 万枚。值得注意的是，Wonderland 当前未经审计，可能还存在一定安全隐患。

![image (3).png](https://img.chainnews.com/material/images/88bef1c082565b2484812e6c7923ebd9_J4TQxO7.png-article)

### 小结

综上，Abracadabra 提供给用户利用生息资产借入 MIM 的能力，可能会将 MIM 打造成更广泛的 DeFi 储备稳定币，Popsicle Finance 会自动帮助用户将流动性放至收益最优且最需流动性的资金池中，同时还将进一步推出允许用户抵押平台上 LP 代币来借入资产的借贷协议，而 OlympusDAO 分叉项目 Wonderland 同时使协议流动性和用户双方受益的设计或将形成一个正反馈机制。

另一方面，更加去中心化且可用生息资产借款的稳定币 MIM，SPELL、TIME 和 ICE 三个协议治理代币，包括各自的质押凭证兼生息资产 sSPELL、MEMO、nICE，也可供用户在这三个协议中互相作用和「循环套娃」来最大化资本效率。

在 Daniele Sestagalli 驱动的真正去中心化的运动「占领 DeFi」（OccupyDeFi）热潮之下，Daniele Sestagalli 作为这三个项目的创始人，通过聚焦流动性收益的最优化、流动性代币的充分利用、生息资产的资本效率最大化等需求，再结合协议自身费用结构、多链设计、可组合性以及激励措施，掀起了足够大的浪花。

虽然这三款产品均为今年发布，但项目的执行力还是不错的，不管是在产品技术、合作进展还是项目表现来看取得了不错的成果。Popsicle Finance 发生过安全事故，不过从社区反应来看用户对该项目的应对方案和进展还是比较认可的。而且 Popsicle Finance 竞品较少，随着 Popsicle Finance 的重新启动以及 LP 收益优化器的即将推出，能否凭借先发优势占领在 DeFi 流动性中抢占份额值得期待。但与此同时，这些协议也存在治理代币在短中期内的通胀压力、缺乏安全审计报告以及有「循环套娃」引发的清算等风险。

title: Catshuis
body:
Het demissionaire kabinet bespreekt vrijdag op het Catshuis wat er gedaan moet worden naar aanleiding van de oplopende coronacijfers. Deskundigen praten de bewindslieden bij over de huidige situatie en het advies vanuit het Outbreak Management Team (OMT), dat donderdag al bijeenkwam. Er liggen nog veel opties op tafel.

Bij het Catshuisoverleg worden meestal de grote lijnen voor het coronabeleid uitgezet. Doorgaans vindt de vergadering plaats op zondag, maar demissionair premier Mark Rutte en demissionair minister van Financiën Wopke Hoekstra reizen zaterdag af naar de G20-top in Rome.

Bronnen melden dat het kabinet openstaat voor een breed scala aan stappen. Zo wil demissionair minister Hugo de Jonge (Volksgezondheid) niet uitsluiten dat er maatregelen komen die alleen gericht zijn op ongevaccineerden. Ook de mogelijkheid om regionaal in te grijpen, ligt weer op tafel.

Daar werd tot nu toe van afgezien, onder meer omdat dat zou kunnen leiden tot problemen met de handhaving en omdat mensen in een klein land als Nederland makkelijk tussen regio's reizen. Het OMT-advies over maatregelen zal een centrale rol spelen in de keuzes die uiteindelijk gemaakt worden.

title: 教程：如何在 Olympus 上抵押欧姆
body:
[OlympusDAO](https://www.olympusdao.finance/)是 OHM 的创造者，OHM 是一种由一篮子加密资产支持的自由浮动储备货币。作为对冲加密市场波动的一种手段，OlympusDAO 专注于供应增长而不是价格升值，以稳定OHM*的价值*（但不一定是价格）。

这是如何运作的？

首先，每个 OHM 代币都由 1 个 DAI 支持，但不一定与其挂钩。虽然挂钩意味着 1 OHM = 1 DAI，但支持意味着 1 OHM >= 1 DAI。这意味着 1 OHM 的值没有上限，但**有**一个下限——1 DAI。或者，换句话说，1 OHM 的内在价值是 1 DAI，但市场价格几乎总是 1 DAI + 溢价。

为了保持国库中代币的价值，OlympusDAO 使用一种债券机制为协议产生利润 + 抵押奖励来激励持有者为协议抵押/提供流动性。OlympusDAO 要么在价格飙升时发行 OHM，要么在价格下跌时回购并销毁它。Stakers 从中获益，通过债券销售获得 rebase 奖励。这一切的结果？即使 OHM 的价格低于您的购买价格，只要有足够长的质押期，您质押的 OHM 余额的增长速度也应该快于价格下降的速度。

在本教程中，我们将探讨如何质押 OHM。完成后，您将正式成为 (3,3)。

## 当您质押 OHM 时会发生什么？

当有人质押他们的 OHM 时，他们的代币会被锁定在协议中 + 他们获得 sOHM 作为回报——一种合成资产，等于您质押的 OHM 的总价值。每 8 小时有一次“rebase”（一种增加质押 OHM 余额的机制），Olympus 协议在此期间铸造新的 OHM，并且大部分新铸造的 OHM 流向质押者。

Olympus 生态系统中的博弈论激励有利于质押者——因为质押 + 绑定对 Olympus 协议有利，OlympusDAO 为帮助他们的人提供好处；相反，如果您出售您的 OHM，您“损害”了协议（通过对 OHM 价格提供下行压力）+ 结果不再获得质押奖励。

下面的博弈论矩阵解释了 (3,3) 模因：

（赌注，赌注）=（3,3）

如果您质押，您和协议都会受益，为所有参与者创造最佳结果。

*现在让我们探索**如何**(3,3)。*

## 如何质押 OHM

**第 1**步**：**在您质押 OHM 之前，您需要在钱包中存入一些。有两种方法可以做到这一点——a) 在你最喜欢的 DEX 上以当前市场价格交换它或 b) 从 OHM 财政部购买债券。（*后者比 OHM 的价格略有折扣，是获得 OHM 代币最便宜的方式。您可以[在此处](https://docs.olympusdao.finance/main/using-the-website/bonds)了解有关 OHM 债券的更多信息。*）

***注意：OlympusDAO 建议将 DAI 换成 OHM 以最大程度地减少滑点，但如果您愿意，您可以将钱包中的任何代币换成 OHM。***

**第 2 步：**选择您的输入货币 + 将输出货币设置为 OHM。添加您要兑换的 OHM 数量，单击批准，然后签署交易。一旦获得批准，您就可以按 Swap 完成您的代币交换。

***如果您在钱包中没有看到 OHM 代币，您可以手动添加[合约地址](https://etherscan.io/address/0x383518188c0c6d7730d91b2c03a03c837814a899)。***

**第 3**[步](https://app.olympusdao.finance/#/)**：**一旦您的钱包中有 OHM 代币，导航到[OlympusDAO 网站](https://app.olympusdao.finance/#/)，连接您的钱包，然后单击 UI 左侧的“Stake”选项卡。

**第 4**步**：**输入您想要质押的 OHM 数量，或者如果您想质押钱包中的所有 OHM，请按“最大”按钮。

**第 5**步**：**第一次使用 OHM 界面时，“Stake OHM”按钮应该显示“Approve”。单击批准并在您的钱包中签署交易。（*这仅在您第一次质押/取消质押时需要。*）

**第 6**步**：**签署批准交易后，按钮应显示“Stake OHM”，如上图所示。单击按钮以质押您想要的 OHM 数量，并再次签署交易。


---

**恭喜！**您已正式质押 OHM 并加入 (3,3) 家族。

欢迎，Ohmie 小伙伴😎

title: OHM token strategy
body:
I recently got into OHM, the native token for Olympus DAO. Hearing the develop on the Bankless podcast helped me feel a bit better about owning their token and using the platform. Last year I bought CRV and MIR tokens, of which i’ve been holding CRV on Aave to get a reasonable APR%, and for MIR i’ve staked a good chunk on their platform and received huge rewards for the first few months, 400-700% APR, which slowly trickled down to a nice 50% APR for the past few months. CRV is obviously huge for enabling layered DeFi assets and providing stablecoins to the masses, and developers, but MIR is less known as it connects with the Terra blockchain ecosystem. Terra has proven itself worthy with the rise of its LUNA native token, and its stablecoin becoming widely used throughout all of crypto. Having experienced new aspects of DeFi, and CeFi with the likes of NEXO, I’m on the look out for the next step in this space and I think OHM is really important right now.

With 8,000% APR, OHM is impossible to pass up at this moment in time. Even better, OHM doesn’t require the usage of Uniswap to create it’s LP; this means you only need to buy OHM to create the LP token, there’s no need to add ETH or some stablecoin. I’m personally not interested in adding my ETH to any sort of liquidity pool system for the foreseeable future -- So, not having to add ETH or some stablecoin to create an LP token on the Olympus DAO protocol is a huge thumbs up for me. I’ve purchased about 10 OHM tokens and subsequently staked them for about 2 weeks. As such i’ve gotten roughly 2 OHM as rewards during that time.

My experience holding MIR token for the past year gives me hope that projects like OHM will at least last longer than one year and will become increasingly profitable over time using this strategy: Buy the token, stake it for a year, unstake it and then sell for a stablecoin. Depending on how you feel about the project after 1 year, you can continue to stake for another year, or cash in and move on to something else. Hopefully within that 1 year time frame the asset has at least doubled, 100% increase, or more then that’s a great investment to be had! The rewards you collected will need to be sold 1 year after you obtained them, which might be difficult to calculate for each protocol, but ultimately these assets *are* capital gains related and should be taxed as such. Keep this in mind. 

OHM has a great feature in that you can connect to Fuse on Rari Capital and use your sOHM tokens as collateral for a loan in USDC/DAI ! This is crazy good, as i can take my rewards for staking OHM, take a loan out on them, and use it for whatever else i need! If anything I could sent it to NEXO and get 10% interest or take a loan out on it as a direct deposit into my checking/debit account. 

I love DeFi and am excited to see what else happens in the coming year!

title: Mint prices should be in fiat, not crypto.
body:
## At least for most projects out there! 

A couple of weeks ago, we wrote a comprehensive post outlining what we believe is a worrying development in the NFT space. ICYMI, read up on it here: 

[https://mirror.xyz/0x473803aBB217127321fcF961830E6E31192e7083/uKq19v3FRbUZz1xRjYlFgVqWGYjjp4K213rUIXZmLqg](https://mirror.xyz/0x473803aBB217127321fcF961830E6E31192e7083/uKq19v3FRbUZz1xRjYlFgVqWGYjjp4K213rUIXZmLqg)

With the recent bull run of crypto currencies in general and Ethereum, that is host to most NFT projects, in particular, we see the main premise of our post confirmed: That in fact, mint prices for NFT projects are entirely disconnected from reality. Now that ETH price has risen significantly, floor prices of countless NFT projects are dropping. Obviously, there are some other factors at play, but rising ETH prices should explain at least a good chunk of the variance.  
  
 Of course, we are not only running our own project with the Ghostwriters Guild, but are also active members of various other NFT communities. We are generally interested in knowing what’s going on in the space and it’s important to us to critically evaluate what makes projects valueable and legitimate and draw our own conclusions. One of the questions we have asked ourselves countless times is why mint prices are set in **ETH and not in say, fiat.** With the recent surge, this has become more relevant than ever. 

There are two obvious and some less obvious answers to this question. The most obvious ones being “*fuck fiat!*” and “*you’re paying to mint in ETH anyway, so that’s naturally the currency prices are set in*”. One emotional and one seemingly logical response. But both hypothetical responses would be missing the point: We’re not asking why *payment* is in ETH, but rather why the *value of the NFT* is denominated in ETH. A very important distinction which is highlighted by the following question I’ve seen asked in a very popular NFT project (and which hasn’t received any response yet). 

![A question that was posted in the discord of a very popular NFT project](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/j7Fu121Rp7RP8CwFCt0pB.JPG?height=83&width=606)

The user asks a legitimate question and the answer isn’t entirely straight-forward. There are only two logical scenarios from a project’s standpoint: 

**Scenario 1** 

The project’s expenses are all calculated and paid for in ETH. The project pays devs, artists and for the entire infrastructure in ETH. In this case, it would be somewhat reasonable to set NFT values in ETH and not make any changes regardless of the price flactuation. The project owners / collaborators would assume the risk of the price fluctuation which could be considered fair to some degree. 

**Scenario 2**

The projects expenses are calculated and paid for in fiat. In this case, it is only reasonable to adjust mint prices based on the initial calculation – lowering the mint price in a bull market and increasing it in a bear market. 

## Reality checking NFT projects. 

In fact, we have seen scenario 2 play out various times in projects that we have been involved in as community members, which does beg the questions: Why did these projects denominate their NFT’s value in ETH to begin with? If you’re changing the mint fee in accordance to current ETH prices, you’re essentially admitting that you’ve been calculating in fiat all along. So naturally, wouldn’t it be reasonable for both, transparency’s sake and for the sake of your own financial planning to set fixed prices in fiat currency and adjust to whatever that translates into ahead of the mint? 

We have made the experience that most expenses for NFT projects, an the Ghostwriters Guild is no exception, have to be actually paid in fiat currencies. We’re paying for web services, developers, artists and smaller expenses like discord server boosts in USD or EUR. For our project, neither a fixed nor a flexible ETH price set in advance would make any sense really and as such, we will be issuing the price for our PFP collection in USD and to whatever number that translates to in ETH once mint date rolls around. Payment will still place in ETH – naturally.

title: Funding Friday: The Tether Bike Light
body:
I backed [this project](https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/91367227/tether-projecting-safe-zones-around-bikes) this morning. The Tether Bike Light is “a bike safety device that projects a safe zone around your bike, responds to road users around you, identifying safe and unsafe roads in your city.”

I like the idea that “locations of overtakes are recorded to **identify safe and unsafe zones in your city** to help plan safer routing.” That is very cool.

[Here’s the video](https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/91367227/tether-projecting-safe-zones-around-bikes) if you want to learn more.
